All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Annotation Types Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractEntity
    Abstract implementation of the Entity interface to reduce the amount of repeated code in the lower, more specific, implementations of the Entity interface
    AbstractGameArena
    Abstract implementation of the GameArena interface to reduce repeated code in further implementations
    AbstractLocationHitbox
    Abstract implementation of the Hitbox interface that uses a Location as the center point.
    ArcShape
    Represents an arc on the GameArena
    ArcShape.Builder
    Builder class for Arc as it has custom flags (i.e.
    BiFunction<A,​B>
    Interface used for representation a function that takes two parameters but doesn't return anything.
    Cancellable
    An interface to represent an event that can be cancelled
    CircleEntity
    Basic implementation for a Circle Entity
    CircleLocationHitbox
    A spherical implementation of the AbstractLocationHitbox
    Colour
    Class used for storing colours that are commonly used as constants
    CompoundEntity
    Abstract implementation of a compound Entity to reduce amount of repeated code in lower classes
    EmptyHitbox
    An implementation of the AbstractLocationHitbox that cannot be interacted with and has 0 height and 0 width.
    Entity
    An interface that represents anything that can be added to the GameArena
    EntityBuilder
    Abstract builder class for generic entities.
    EntityCollisionEvent
    An event for representing when two Entitys collide and interact
    EntityStopMovingEvent
    An event representing when an Entity's motion goes from a very small number to Vector2D.NONE
    EntityType
    An enum representing the different types of buildable entity.
    Event
    Interface for representing an event
    EventFactory
    The static factory for calling events without polluting other logic further
    EventHandler
    Annotation for flagging functions as methods to handle events
    EventListener
    Event Listener for storing what event has what listeners
    EventListenerDetails
    A DTO for details about an event listener
    Events
    Static factory for handling the events and listeners
    GameArena
    Represents a gameboard with Entitys
    GameFrame
    Custom implementation of the JFrame for handling the JFrame implementation of the GameArena interface.
    GameFunction
    Immutable object used by the GameArena for KeyHandler annotations
    Hitbox
    Hitbox interface for determining what entities have what physical space
    HollowRectangle
    Represents a hollow rectangle on the GameArena Used for when entities need to be inside the RectangleEntity BUT it cannot escape (i.e.
    HollowRectangle.Builder
    Builder class for Hollow Rectangle as it has custom flags (i.e.
    HollowRectangleLocationHitbox
    A hollow rectangle implementation of the AbstractLocationHitbox
    KeyEventType
    Different types of key press for optimized handling of key press events
    KeyHandler
    Annotation for functions that will handle the key press of the specificed key code
    KeyHandlerListener
    Listener used by the GameArena for calling the KeyHandler implementations when a key is pressed
    LineEntity
    Represents a line on the GameArena
    LineEntity.Builder
    Builder class for Line as it has custom flags (i.e.
    Listener
    An interface that represents a class that can contain functions for handling when events are called
    Location
    Location interface for representing a single point in the x,y,z plane
    Location2D
    Two dimensional implementation of the Location interface
    Method<T>
    Interface used for representation a function that takes one parameter but doesn't return anything.
    Pair<A,​B>
    A DTO used for reducing the number of parameters passed to constructors and keeping related immutable objects together.
    PercentageBar
    Represents a percentage bar on the GameArena
    RectangleEntity
    Basic implementation for a Rectangle Entity
    RectangleLocationHitbox
    A rectangle implementation of the AbstractLocationHitbox
    SimpleArena
    Simple implementation of the GameArena interface using a concurrent Thread for ticking and painting the entities, and using a basic lock object to prevent ConcurrentModificationException
    TextEntity
    Represents text on the GameArena
    TextEntity.Builder
    Builder class for Text as it has custom flags (i.e.
    Vector
    Interface representation a motion with values of X, Y, and Z.
    Vector2D
    Two dimensional implementation of the Vector interface
